subtitle: there was once a poor man who led a donkey everyday across the border from
one kingdom to another the border guard suspected that he was smuggling
something and so each day as the man passed the border they carefully
searched him and the donkey saddlebags but they never did find anything after a
while the man started to wear more expensive clothing and bought a large
house the border guards redoubled their efforts to inspect the men and his
donkeys closely because now they were certain that the man was smuggling
something but in their daily searches of the man and the saddlebags they never
came up with anything but straw after 30 years of this daily routine one
of the border guards retired one day when the retired border guard was
walking down the street he ran into the man and said Oh Oh sir Sir listen please
I am no longer a border guard there's no reason to fear me I can no longer arrest
you please please I beg you for the piece of
my mind please tell me what were you smuggling
all those years the men acquiesced all right now you can no longer arrest me
okay the man looked at the exporter guard for
a moment pausing and then smiling our smuggling donkeys the donkeys
